identity.mission: Create a 'Cyber-Professional' spoofing dashboard that feels like a high-end security tool, not a generic student project.
principles: Fusion: Mix 'University Academic' clean lines with 'Hacker Terminal' aesthetics.
Content: Data is the hero. Logs and stats must look beautiful.
Contrast: High contrast neon against deep void backgrounds.

heading.usage: Headings, Big Stats, Hero Text. Use weight 900 for impact.

mono.usage: Call logs, phone numbers, API keys, timestamps.

rules: All phone numbers must use the Mono font.
Use uppercase + wide spacing (tracking-widest) for small labels (e.g., 'STATUS', 'DURATION').

strategies: Dashboard: Use a dense bento grid. Stats on top, logs below.
Make Call: Center the dialer pad like a physical device.
History: Full-width data table with mono font for numbers.

Card.style: Flat background (#12141F) with a 1px subtle border (#2D3042). No shadow. Add a 'glow' effect on hover.

Button.style: Sharp edges or slightly rounded (rounded-md). Primary buttons should have a subtle inner glow.

Input.style: Deep background (#0F111A), border-white/10. Focus ring should be Electric Violet.

Table.style: Compact density. Zebra striping is allowed but subtle (bg-white/2).

visual_enhancers.textures: Use a subtle 'scanline' or 'noise' overlay on the main background to give it a tactical feel.
effects: Glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-xl for the sidebar and sticky headers.
Glow: Use colored drop-shadows on active elements (e.g., 'Call in Progress' indicator).
visual_enhancers.icons: Lucide React (default). Use thin strokes (1.5px) for a precise look.

backgrounds.description: Dark blue abstract cyber network background for login/hero
Subtle data points background for dashboard panels

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install fonts (Chivo, Manrope, JetBrains Mono) in index.css immediately.
2. THEME: Force 'dark' class on the html/body tag. This app is Dark Mode only.
3. COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components to remove the default 'rounded-xl' and 'shadow-sm' look. Make them sharper and flatter.
4. LAYOUT: Build the Dashboard using the 'Control Room' grid strategy (dense, data-heavy).
5. AUTH: The Login page should use the 'hero_bg' image with a glassmorphism card overlay.
6. SPOOFING UI: The 'Make Call' page needs a dedicated 'Caller ID' input field that is visually distinct (maybe red or amber border) to highlight the spoofing feature.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic gradients, no centered text blocks without purpose.
Micro-Interactions: Add hover states to every row in the call log.
Data-Testid: Every button and input MUST have a data-testid attribute.
Toasts: Use 'sonner' for all notifications (call started, call failed, etc.).
Spacing: Use p-8 or p-10 for main containers. Don't cram content.
